hotels.title: Five-Star Rwanda One&Only Gorilla's Nest Wilderness Retreat at Volcanoes National Park
hotels.description: Reconnect with nature at the five-star One&Only Gorilla's Nest, a treetop palace that borders the edge of Volcanoes National Park, home to the majestic mountain gorilla. Lush gardens and incredible birdlife surround each secluded free-standing lodge and suite, and local plant life inspires everything around you, from food and drinks to spa treatments. Luxurious resort facilities include The Nest - a decadent restaurant serving up a daily-changing, seasonal menu using ingredients from the onsite garden - and Nest Bar, where you can sit and enjoy cocktails crafted by expert mixologists. When you're not being wined and dined, unwind at the One&Only Spa for a pampering treatment using local products and traditional African wisdom. Or, head out mountain biking, get involved in community and conservation experiences and explore the national park on a hike through the bamboo forest while keeping your eyes peeled for gorillas.
